Landing.heroTitle:
Orchestrate your AI agents
from a single terminal
Landing.heroDescription: Intelligently delegate to Gemini, Claude, or Codex. Parallelize tasks with Swarm Mode. Track quotas in real-time.
Landing.featuresDescription: A single CLI to manage all your local AI agents.
Landing.feature1Desc: Jarvis analyzes your task and assigns it to the optimal agent: Gemini for UI, Claude for logic, Codex for tests.
Landing.feature2Desc: Automatically decompose complex tasks into parallel sub-tasks executed by multiple agents simultaneously.
Landing.feature3Desc: Visualize your Gemini, Claude, and OpenAI usage in real-time. No more billing surprises.

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, {name}. Your agents are ready.

Features.pageDescription: Jarvis is not just another chatbot wrapper. It is a multi-agent orchestrator designed to maximize the efficiency of your AI CLIs.
